Exercicio_4a

a.) 11001(2) - 1101(2) = X(2)     
11001 + C2,5(01101) = 11001 + 10011 = (1)01100(2)

b.) 101,1101(2) - 10,01(2) = X(2) 
101,1101 + C2,7(10,0100) = 101,1101 + 001,1011 = 111,1000(2)

c.) 312(4) - 231(4) = X(4)          
110110(2) - 101101(2) = 1001(2) = 21(4)

d.) 376(8) - 267(8) = X(8)          
011111110(2) - 010110111(2) = 1000111(2) = 107(8)

e.) 7D2(16) - A51(16) = X(16)         
0111 1101 0010(2) - 1010 0101 0001(2) = 0010 0111 1111(2) = 27F(16)
